about_the_game:
It has been 200 years since the events of Spiral Clicker 1, and nearly 50 since the disbanding of The Harem. Mana which had become abundant under the old Leader's rule is now beginning to run dry. Though efforts have been made to conserve what little mana is left, only the Leader knew the secret of generating new mana. At least... That is what everyone thought.

You return home one day to find a green haired elf in your bedroom with an interesting offer... She will give you the secret to mana generation. As long as you help keep her entertained...



Spiral Clicker 2 seeks to improve upon the first game by offering a better resolution for computers, progression for both dominant and submissive playstyles, new flavor in the form of a spell system and new stories for each harem member; both returning members and new ones.

content_descriptors.notes:
Spiral Clicker 2 contains the following:
Characters posing nude.
Characters being mind controlled. (Trance, personality changes, and love spells)
Characters being transformed. (Petrification, and breast expansion)
Characters masturbating.
A Character being restrained.

All characters present in Spiral Clicker 2 are 18+

name: Spiral Clicker 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Click to gain mana and build a harem of women from all across the multiverse!
